thread.title: Last Remaining Homesites Now Available at Valencia Cove by GL...
thread.title_full: Last Remaining Homesites Now Available at Valencia Cove by GL... | www.palmbeachpost.com

author: GL Homes
title: Last Remaining Homesites Now Available at Valencia Cove by GL...
text:
The last remaining homesites, featuring the Signature Collection of residences, are now available at Valencia Cove in Boynton Beach. Homebuyers looking to enjoy the good life at GL Homes’ luxury 55+ community are urged to visit today to see the gorgeous homesites, all of which have preserve or lake views. Valencia Cove offers stunning residences, priced from the $450,000s, and sets the gold standard for active retirement living with a lifestyle that encompasses all of the relaxation amenities and activities right at their doorsteps.
“These are our last remaining homesites and they are going to go fast,” said Theresa Fowler, vice president and project manager for GL Homes at Valencia Cove.
The two home collections at Valencia Cove include the Signature and Vintage, which offer 13 floorplans that range in size from 1,550 to 2,732 air-conditioned square feet of living space. The homes feature two to four bedrooms, two to four bathrooms, and two- or three-car garages. Priced from the $450,000s, the two home collections at Valencia Cove include the Signature and Vintage, which offer 13 floorplans that range in size from 1,550 to 2,732 air-conditioned square feet of living space. The homes feature two to four bedrooms, two to four bathrooms and two- or three-car garages. Valencia Cove’s magnificent model center includes 10 spectacular decorator appointed homes and the community also offers an incredible selection of move-in ready homes for those eager to start living the good life.
Currently, new homebuyer incentives include $5,000 in upgrades on select homesites from the Signature and Vintage collections and, depending on the model, up to $12,500 off the list price on Quick-Delivery Residences.
The tennis center features eight Har-Tru tennis courts and a tennis/pro shop, where residents enjoy a world-class tennis program. In addition, there are four pickleball courts, two handball and bocce courts and half-court basketball. The Lifestyle Center is also open, where residents can gather for card games and more as the clubhouse receives its finishing touches.
From the Signature Collection and featured in the model center, the Sophia features two bedrooms, including a spacious master suite, a den/optional third bedroom, and a great room (pictured) with sweeping view of the kitchen and dining area. The Sophia also includes a covered patio and two-car garage, making the floorplan a total of 1,550 square feet under air. Valencia Cove’s 39,000-square-foot decorator-appointed clubhouse will feature a sweeping grand foyer; an elegant social hall with raised stage and dance floor; catering kitchen with separate demonstration cooking studio; fully equipped fitness center with men’s and women’s locker rooms, steam rooms and massage rooms; four card rooms; billiards and internet areas; yoga/exercise room with ping pong tables; indoor/outdoor cafe; and spacious covered patio. The lifestyle director will coordinate activities, trips, shows and more than 100 clubs.
Other outdoor amenities will include a resort pool, a resistance exercise pool and swimmer’s lap pool, a whirlpool spa, a grandchildren’s wading pool, and shade pavilions.
Valencia Cove is conveniently located near beaches, shopping, fine dining and more. To visit, exit Interstate 95 or the Florida Turnpike at Boynton Beach Blvd., and go west to Lyons Road. Head south and Valencia Cove is on the left. For more information, call 561-738-5100, or visit www.glhomes.com.
FOR MORE INFORMATION

</p
